import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ReplyService } from '../../reply.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reponses', templateUrl: './reponses.component.html', }) export class ReponsesComponent { clicked: any; reply: string | undefined; ngOnInit() { this.replyService.clicked$.subscribe(nouvelleValeur => { this.clicked = nouvelleValeur; }); } constructor(private replyService: ReplyService) { this.replyService.reply$.subscribe(reply => { this.reply = reply; }); } }
